w3

version: 3.0.0

single page web server. great for development!

  • NOTE: This webserver is aways setup to serve spa's so if the requested file does not exists, unless there is a 404.html in the direction, it will serve index.html.

Install

npm install w3 -g

Usage

w3 [directory]

or

PORT=5000 w3 [directory]

ENABLE Cache

w3 --cache

Requirements

  • NodeJs

Thanks

  • @nodejs community

Contributions

  • Pull Request Welcome

LICENSE

MIT
